title: How to Fold an Origami Frog

steps.title: Put the paper down flat in front of you.
steps.content: Put the paper down flat in front of you. Fold it into a triangle by bringing one corner to meet the opposite corner.

steps.title: Fold it in half again to make a triangle half that size.
steps.content: Fold it in half again to make a triangle half that size. Then unfold this part.

steps.title: Fold the bottom two corners in to meet at the center of the bottom edge.
steps.content: Fold the bottom two corners in to meet at the center of the bottom edge.

steps.title: Fold the edges to meet in the middle.
steps.content: Fold the edges to meet in the middle. Let the corners come out from behind.

steps.title: Next, fold up the bottom edge.
steps.content: Next, fold up the bottom edge.

steps.title: Fold over 2 more times like an accordion.
steps.content: Fold over 2 more times like an accordion. This will make the frog jump.

steps.title: You can draw on the eyes.
steps.content: You can draw on the eyes.
